snippet: Lyndon B. Johnson's many achievements that still profoundly affect American lives today have been overshadowed by the disaster of the Vietnam War.

byline.original: By ALBERT R. HUNT | BLOOMBERG VIEW

lead_paragraph: Lyndon B. Johnson's many achievements that still profoundly affect American lives today have been overshadowed by the disaster of the Vietnam War.

headline.main: Remembering L.B.J. for More Than Vietnam
headline.print_headline: Remembering L.B.J. for More Than Vietnam
